Description: Multi-tier web application infrastructure with high availability - Production Grade

EnvironmentName.Description: An environment name that is prefixed to resource names
EnvironmentName.ConstraintDescription: Must begin with a lowercase letter, contain only lowercase alphanumeric characters and hyphens, max 20 characters

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers
InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type

EnableDetailedMonitoring.Description: Enable detailed monitoring for EC2 instances

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 KeyPair for SSH access (optional - leave blank for no SSH access)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer - allows HTTP from internet
Security group for web server instances - allows HTTP from ALB

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow HTTP from anywhere (for direct Elastic IP access)

Properties.AlarmDescription: Scale up when average CPU exceeds 70%
Scale down when average CPU is below 30%

LoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

LoadBalancerURL.Description: Full URL of the Application Load Balancer

WebServerInstance1URL.Description: Direct URL to WebServer 1 via Elastic IP

WebServerInstance2URL.Description: Direct URL to WebServer 2 via Elastic IP

WebServerSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for Web Servers

LoadBalancerSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for Load Balancer

EC2RoleArn.Description: ARN of the IAM role for EC2 instances

AutoScalingGroupName.Description: Name of the Auto Scaling Group

TargetGroupArn.Description: ARN of the ALB Target Group
